description: Built for day-in-day out pursuits, from work to cragging and everything in between, the Mantle Pant is a classic 5-pocket pant made from durable organic cotton canvas fabric with a touch of stretch. Articulated knees and a gusseted inseam provide plenty of room for movement, with two front hand pockets, two rear drop-in pockets, and a right thigh zip pocket. Belt loop waist band with a button zip fly closure.
name: Black Diamond Mantle Pants - Mens
